title: King's War
description: FROM THE DRUG GANGS OF DOWNTOWN INDIANAPOLIS, THE ONE TRUE KING WILL ARISE.King has been betrayed, but he has no time to lick his wounds - he has to draw his people together to fight the ultimate foe in this conclusion to the stunning Knights of Breton Court trilogy.File Urban Fantasy [ Street Gangs | Drug Wars | Wild Magic | Betrayal ]e-book 9780857661319
author: Maurice Broaddus
